name: Support Triage Agent
description: AI agent for triaging customer support requests using Microsoft documentation and Azure knowledge. Analyzes support tickets, searches relevant documentation, and provides actionable solutions.

skills.name: Support Request Triage
skills.description: Analyzes customer support requests and provides solutions using Microsoft Learn documentation and Azure expertise
examples: How do I deploy a Python FastAPI application to Azure?
What are the best practices for securing Azure Container Apps?
How can I troubleshoot authentication issues in Azure?
Help me understand Azure networking for container apps
